ai_flow.test.api package¶

Submodules¶

ai_flow.test.api.mock_plugins module¶

class ai_flow.test.api.mock_plugins.MockBlobManger(config)[source]¶

Bases: ai_flow.plugin_interface.blob_manager_interface.BlobManager

download_project(workflow_snapshot_id, remote_path: str, local_path: Optional[str] = None) → str[source]¶

download the needed resource from remote blob server to local process for remote execution.

Parameters

  • workflow_snapshot_id – It is the unique identifier for each workflow generation.

  • remote_path – The project package uri.

  • local_path – Download file root path.

:return Local project path.

upload_project(workflow_snapshot_id: str, project_path: str) → str[source]¶

upload a given project to blob server for remote execution.

Parameters

  • workflow_snapshot_id – It is the unique identifier for each workflow generation.

  • project_path – the path of this project.

:return the uri of the uploaded project file in blob server.

Bases: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobPluginFactory, ai_flow.translator.translator.JobGenerator, ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobController

cleanup_job(job_handle: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle, job_runtime_env: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv)[source]¶

Clean up temporary resources created during this execution. :param job_runtime_env: The job runtime environment. Type: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv :param job_handle: The job handle that contains the necessary information for an execution.

generate(sub_graph: ai_flow.ai_graph.ai_graph.AISubGraph, resource_dir: Optional[str] = None) → ai_flow.workflow.job.Job[source]¶

Convert AISubGraph(ai_flow.ai_graph.ai_graph.AISubGraph) to Job(ai_flow.workflow.job.Job) :param sub_graph: An executable Graph composed of AINode and data edges with the same job configuration. :param resource_dir: Store the executable files generated during the generation process. :return: Job(ai_flow.workflow.job.Job)

get_job_controller() → ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobController[source]¶

:return a JobController which type is same with AbstractJobPluginFactory job_type.

get_job_generator() → ai_flow.translator.translator.JobGenerator[source]¶

:return a JobGenerator which type is same with AbstractJobPluginFactory job_type.

get_job_status(job_handle: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle) → ai_flow.workflow.status.Status[source]¶

Return the job status.

get_result(job_handle: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle, blocking: bool = True)[source]¶

Return the job result. :param job_handle: The job handle that contains the necessary information for an execution. :param blocking: blocking is true: Wait for the job to finish and return the result of the job.

blocking is false: If the job is running, return None.

If the job is finish, return the result of job.

job_type() → str[source]¶
Returns

The job type.

stop_job(job_handle: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle, job_runtime_env: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv)[source]¶

Stop a ai flow job. :param job_runtime_env: The job runtime environment. Type: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv :param job_handle: The job handle that contains the necessary information for an execution.

submit_job(job: ai_flow.workflow.job.Job, job_runtime_env: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle[source]¶

Submit an executable job to run. :param job_runtime_env: The job runtime environment. Type: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv :param job: A job object that contains the necessary information for an execution. :return job_handle: a job handle that maintain the handler of a job runtime.

pause_workflow_scheduling(project_name: str, workflow_name: str) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.WorkflowInfo[source]¶

Make the scheduler stop scheduling the workflow. :param project_name: The project name. :param workflow_name: The workflow name. :return: The workflow information.

restart_job_execution(job_name: str, workflow_execution_id: str) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.JobExecutionInfo[source]¶

Make the scheduler restart a job execution. If job status is running, first stop the job and then start it. :param job_name: The job name. :param workflow_execution_id: The workflow execution id. :return: The job execution information.

resume_workflow_scheduling(project_name: str, workflow_name: str) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.WorkflowInfo[source]¶

Make the scheduler resume scheduling the workflow. :param project_name: The project name. :param workflow_name: The workflow name. :return: The workflow information.

Make the scheduler start a new job execution. :param job_name: The job name. :param workflow_execution_id: The workflow execution id. :return: The job execution information.

Make the scheduler new a workflow execution. :param project_name: The project name. :param workflow_name: The workflow name. :return: The workflow execution information.

Stop all workflow execution of the workflow. :param project_name: The project name. :param workflow_name: The workflow name. :return: The workflow execution information.

Make the scheduler stop the job execution. :param job_name: The job name. :param workflow_execution_id: The workflow execution id. :return: The job execution information.

Stop the workflow execution by execution id. :param workflow_execution_id: The workflow execution id. :return: The workflow execution information.
